thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Never again
thread.title_full: Never again - Review of Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ax_in_CH
title: Never again
text:
I was looking for a budget hotel in the city and decided to book this one after reading some good reviews... Mistake!
I’ll start by the positive things:
Good location
Friendly staff
Good price for central London
But:
The bed was very small
The mattress was way too soft
It was clean…ish, it could have been better (e.g. the top shower bar was really dusty)
We booked a room in the lower floor (without window) and Internet was only working intermittently... Really annoying. We had to go upstairs a couple of times!
There was phone signal to make/receive phone calls... Really annoying too!
The air in the room was really stuffy, hot, smelly
The room and the whole corridor was smelly. It was really bad.
It was only bearable because we’re not too fuss and only spent little time in the room, but frankly I would never go back to this hotel and I would not recommend it to anyone. Maybe the rooms with windows in the upper floors are better, I don’t know.
